
Consider the following statement as truth: {{Teknolust is a 2002 film written, produced, and directed by Lynn Hershman Leeson who, at the time of production, was working in the art department at University of California, Davis.}}.
What is the most appropriate relation between {{Teknolust}} and {{Lynn Hershman Leeson}} from the following options?

{{organization has member}}
{{has sibling}}
{{no relation}}
{{from country}}
{{has parent}}
{{has spouse}}
{{organization leader}}
{{has child}}
{{event year}}
{{has population}}
{{won award}}
{{has genre}}
{{organization has founder}}
{{headquarters}}
{{is member of}}
{{first product}}
{{has occupation}}
{{movie has director}}
{{has author}}
{{starring}}
{{has type}}
{{located in}}
{{birth place}}
{{has education}}

Please choose the most suitable option from the given choices.
    
{{has education}}
